annotation.spannedText: We in Australia have some of the best population data in the world on vaccination outcomes in children and it’s absolutely clear these myths are just that, myths

classMention.mentionClass: We in Australia have some of the best population data in the world on vaccination outcomes in children and it’s absolutely clear these myths are just that, myths

annotation.spannedText: It was disastrous that the medical and epidemiological professions didn’t respond after the kids were shown on television with the claims of vaccine caused brain injury

classMention.mentionClass: It was disastrous that the medical and epidemiological professions didn’t respond after the kids were shown on television with the claims of vaccine caused brain injury

annotation.spannedText: it’s a tragedy that it took an epidemic to prove that vaccination is protective

classMention.mentionClass: it’s a tragedy that it took an epidemic to prove that vaccination is protective

annotation.spannedText: The myth that the MMR vaccine causes autism is particularly naughty

classMention.mentionClass: The myth that the MMR vaccine causes autism is particularly naughty

annotation.spannedText: The paper was retracted but the damage was done

classMention.mentionClass: The paper was retracted but the damage was done

annotation.spannedText: Such myths demonstrate why it’s absolutely crucial that medical researchers obtain solid laboratory data about new and combination vaccines, test them rigorously and obtain very good surveillance and monitoring data

classMention.mentionClass: Such myths demonstrate why it’s absolutely crucial that medical researchers obtain solid laboratory data about new and combination vaccines, test them rigorously and obtain very good surveillance and monitoring data

annotation.spannedText: The public must have confidence that the research is done and done well

classMention.mentionClass: The public must have confidence that the research is done and done well

annotation.spannedText: get the truth about the myths

classMention.mentionClass: get the truth about the myths

annotation.spannedText: Vaccination is a wonderful development in public health

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccination is a wonderful development in public health

annotation.spannedText: It has prevented enormous suffering and millions of deaths worldwide

classMention.mentionClass: It has prevented enormous suffering and millions of deaths worldwide

annotation.spannedText: The benefits of vaccination outweigh the very small risk of unwanted side effects

classMention.mentionClass: The benefits of vaccination outweigh the very small risk of unwanted side effects
